references.reason: This paper introduces the core concept of diffusion models, which form the foundation of the proposed Diff-SR method.

references.paper_title: Score-based generative modeling through stochastic differential equations
references.reason: This paper details the theoretical framework and practical methods for training diffusion models, providing the basis for utilizing them in RL.

references.paper_title: FLAMBE: structural complexity and representation learning of low rank mdps
references.reason: This work establishes the theoretical foundation for spectral methods in RL, influencing the representation learning approach in Diff-SR.

references.paper_title: Provably efficient reinforcement learning with linear function approximation
references.reason: This paper is highly relevant due to its focus on efficient reinforcement learning with function approximation, a key problem addressed by Diff-SR.

references.paper_title: Latent variable representation for reinforcement learning
references.reason: This paper introduces the LV-Rep framework, which is closely related to Diff-SR in its aim to learn efficient representations for RL, providing a comparative baseline.
